page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT IN THE VILLAGE
page.content: Apart from agriculture, there are other opportunuties for employment in the rural areas, particularly for the self-employed. There are several self-employed tradesmen - four builders, a painter/decorator, a carpenter, a horticulturist, two car repairers and two establishments used as boarding kennels. Some of these businesses employ a few staff, others are one-man concerns. There is a large business outside {Elston}engaged in the manufacture of motor caravans.{ {Elston Towers}(also known as{ {Middleton's Folly}), an imposing building close to the{Fosse Way}, has seen several business ventures. It was used as a maggot factory at one time but closed down in 1974 much to the relief of the local population! There has been recent interest in converting it into a motel.
